Metadata.title: ViLearning | AI-Powered Spatial Learning Canvas
Metadata.description: ViLearning upgrades scattered knowledge into collaborative spatial learning canvases. Blend context engineering, a top-tier model matrix, and multi-display outputs to plan, learn, and create together.

AboutPage.title: About ViLearning
AboutPage.description: ViLearning builds an AI-powered spatial learning canvas that turns scattered information into multi-display knowledge networks.
AboutPage.introduction: Hello, we are ViLearning-focused on turning complex learning journeys into collaborative spatial knowledge via context engineering, a top-tier model matrix, and the display factory. We'd love to discuss roadmap or partnerships.

HomePage.title: ViLearning
HomePage.description: Build context-first spatial learning canvases powered by ViLearning's top-tier model matrix.

hero.title: Weave <flow>Spatial Knowledge</flow> with <ai>Top-Tier AI</ai>
hero.description: ViLearning blends context engineering, a top-tier model matrix, and a multi-display factory so fragmented information becomes a collaborative knowledge network.

logocloud.title: Beta teams already connect multi-thread learning with ViLearning

tutorials.title: LEARNING ROUTES
tutorials.subtitle: Master ViLearning's spatial workflow
tutorials.description: Step through materials ingestion, context engineering, and multi-display output to build your ViLearning journey.

useCases.title: SPATIAL PLAYBOOKS
useCases.subtitle: Three flagship scenarios to start fast
useCases.description: Choose the spatial-learning playbook that fits and drop your materials plus prompts into the ViLearning board to feel multi-display collaboration.

item-1.title: Universal context engineering workspace
item-1.description: Gather meeting notes, research, and to-do lists into a spatial knowledge web that can expand into flowcharts, mind maps, and quizzes anytime.
item-1.prompt: Organize these inputs into a ViLearning spatial canvas: (1) product strategy meeting notes highlighting three workstreams, (2) customer research summary with key insights, (3) next actions with owners. Output the top-level structure with attached display nodes.

item-2.title: Business-school study abroad planning
item-2.description: From study abroad plans and internships to job timelines, build a multi-display canvas with integrated timelines and skill maps.
item-2.prompt: Design a Fall 2026 business-school study and career plan with four pillars - profile building, language exams, internship rotations, and interview prep - and create a flowchart or timeline display for each.

item-3.title: ADHD multi-thread learning console
item-3.description: Organize scattered learning tasks by priority, energy curve, and rewards so every thread stays visible on the canvas.
item-3.prompt: Create a ViLearning space covering data analytics study, product teardown practice, and fitness tracking. Provide daily cadence, trigger conditions, and reward nodes, and output flowchart displays plus daily quiz cards.

item-4.title: Workshop knowledge inventory
item-4.description: Capture workshop remarks, ideas, and follow-ups in real time, branching conversations to explore each solution.
item-4.prompt: Document an AI learning product roundtable: capture four speakers' viewpoints, conflicts, and open questions, output a mind map display, and create branch entry points for each topic.

item-5.title: Course quizzes and error bank
item-5.description: Turn class notes and mistakes into quiz cards and reinforcement paths to support self-testing and review.
item-5.prompt: Generate five quiz-card displays from the provided microeconomics notes and mark each with knowledge nodes and review tips.

item-6.title: Team strategy sprint board
item-6.description: Use ViLearning to consolidate market insights, experiment results, and the roadmap so the team iterates strategy quickly.
item-6.prompt: Create a strategy sprint canvas for a B2B SaaS team featuring market insights, experiment backlog, success metrics, and risk plans, plus matching flowcharts and action cards.

demo.title: Experience ViLearning's spatial rhythm
demo.subtitle: Any entry drops you into the spatial learning canvas
demo.description: Import materials, paste prompts, or reuse an old board-ViLearning instantly combines the context and produces multiple displays.

feature-1.title: One-click import of materials or links
feature-1.description: Feed webpages, documents, or lecture notes - ViLearning parses the context, creates structured nodes, and lets you switch displays anytime.

feature-2.title: Multi-display factory
feature-2.description: From flowcharts and mind maps to quiz cards and timelines, the top-tier model matrix picks the presentation best suited to the context.

feature-3.title: Branch conversations and version tracking
feature-3.description: Create branch conversations on any node, save context snapshots, compare solutions, and roll back in one click.

howItWorks.title: Build a spatial learning canvas in 3 steps
howItWorks.subtitle: Context-driven, multi-display storytelling
howItWorks.description: ViLearning unifies materials, conversations, and prompts in a context pipeline, then lets the model matrix output the best-fitting display.

step-1.title: Aggregate context
step-1.description: Import materials, choose board snapshots, and add high-priority prompts to establish the spatial learning context.
details: Drag in documents, webpages, or images and ViLearning performs semantic cleanup automatically.
Set project-level prompts and key variables so high-priority information comes first.
Save whiteboard snapshots for future branching and traceability.

step-2.title: Call the top-tier model matrix
step-2.description: Choose the model best suited to the scenario (DeepSeek during testing, more options later) and generate a structured draft from the context.
details: The model matrix automatically determines whether it needs reasoning, structured output, or dialogue capabilities.
Prebuild JSON structures for flowcharts, mind maps, quizzes, and more
Return generation progress instantly and tag every context reference.

step-3.title: Collaborate and branch on the canvas
step-3.description: Mount displays on the ViLearning board, drag to refine content, and create branch conversations for different solutions.
details: Drag nodes, adjust displays, and save context snapshots in real time.
Open branch conversations on key nodes to compare different paths
Export or share the canvas, or reuse it as high-priority context for later model calls.

aiCapabilities.title: MULTI DISPLAY ENGINE
aiCapabilities.subtitle: Structured output from flowcharts through quiz cards
aiCapabilities.description: Whether it's images, text, or whiteboard content, ViLearning converts it into structured data and outputs flowcharts, mind maps, quiz cards, timelines, and more.
aiCapabilities.sideDescription: Before the model runs, the pipeline highlights essentials and references so every display stays tied to its sources.

workflow.step-1: Import text, images, or links to generate context vectors and summaries.
workflow.step-2: The model matrix produces structured JSON templates based on the scenario.
workflow.step-3: Render with the display factory and mount the result onto the ViLearning board

items.title: Flowchart: product iteration decisions
items.description: Turn meeting notes into key nodes and decision gates so the team can lock the next experiment.
items.ctaPrompt: Using the meeting notes - 1) gather user feedback 2) set three priority tiers 3) assess technical feasibility 4) proceed to experiment or drop - output a flowchart display.

items.title: Mind map: course knowledge web
items.description: Transform the course outline into a layered concept map that supports future quiz nodes.
items.ctaPrompt: Convert the 'Marketing Fundamentals' outline into a mind map display with STP, 4P, market research, and brand management branches, listing key concepts for each.

items.title: Quiz cards: review mistakes
items.description: Automatically turn class notes into quiz questions with mistake reviews and hints.
items.ctaPrompt: From the hypothesis testing chapter, create four multiple-choice cards including the question, options, correct answer, and hint.

comparison.title: Why choose ViLearning?
comparison.subtitle: Spatial learning vs. traditional tools
comparison.description: Compare ViLearning with traditional notes, whiteboards, or single-purpose flowchart tools to see what context engineering and the model matrix add.

traditional.title: Traditional tools
traditional.subtitle: Fragmented and heavy on manual cleanup
traditional.item-1: Requires manual copy/paste, making alignment difficult
traditional.item-2: Lacks context weighting and citation tracking.
traditional.item-3: Flowcharts, mind maps, and quizzes require switching between multiple tools.
traditional.item-4: Team collaboration relies on screenshots or exports
traditional.item-5: Version tracking and branch exploration are almost impossible.
traditional.item-6: Model capabilities are limited, making it hard to switch vendors quickly.
traditional.item-7: Materials and outputs are disconnected, making retrospectives hard

flowchartAi.title: ViLearning
flowchartAi.subtitle: A context-driven spatial learning operating system
flowchartAi.item-1: Automatically aggregate context and tag every citation
flowchartAi.item-2: The top-tier model matrix switches to the best capability for each scenario.
flowchartAi.item-3: The multi-display factory supports flowcharts, mind maps, quizzes, and timelines
flowchartAi.item-4: Whiteboard collaboration, drag-and-drop layout, and instant snapshots.
flowchartAi.item-5: Branch conversations and version history make it easy to compare solutions
flowchartAi.item-6: Model customization and governance reports coming soon
flowchartAi.item-7: Secure hosting with an enterprise roadmap

features.title: CONTEXT-FIRST ENGINE
features.subtitle: Help top-tier models fully understand your content
features.description: ViLearning turns materials and prompts into collaborative spatial knowledge via context pipelines, the model matrix, and the display factory.

item-1.title: Context engineering pipeline
item-1.description: Automatically aggregate project prompts, board snapshots, and citations, scoring high-priority context so the model misses nothing important.

item-2.title: Top-tier model matrix
item-2.description: During this testing phase we prefer DeepSeek; later you can switch among top-tier models in ViLearning to call reasoning or structured abilities as needed.

item-3.title: Multi-display factory
item-3.description: Supports flowcharts, mind maps, quiz cards, timelines, and more display formats to come.

item-4.title: Branches and traceability
item-4.description: Branch conversations anytime, capture context snapshots, and compare outcomes to build a fully traceable learning record.

features.overviewDescription: From individuals to teams, you can launch spatial learning with minimal effort while keeping materials, conversations, and outputs tightly linked.

items.title: Knowledge worker: project tactics board
items.snippet: Enter market research, competitor analysis, and next-test hypotheses to automatically generate strategy flowcharts and risk matrices.
items.description: Help product or consulting teams quickly capture actionable spatial knowledge.
items.ctaPrompt: Convert the market insight summary, competitor comparison, and experiment backlog into a ViLearning space with flowchart or card displays and an action list.

items.title: Business-school applicants: full process
items.snippet: Combine timelines and quiz cards to keep tracking language exams, applications, and internships.
items.description: Make application cadence, material preparation, and capability building transparent on a single canvas.
items.ctaPrompt: Use the application timeline to build four modules - profile building, language exams, school selection, and internship or job prep - with flowchart displays and key reminders for each.

items.title: ADHD learner: multi-thread console
items.snippet: Use the display factory to attach different task threads to the board and keep motivation with rewards.
items.description: Create a spatial learning experience built around energy curves and rewards.
items.ctaPrompt: Design daily cadence, reminders, and rewards for programming, language practice, and fitness threads, then generate editable mind maps and quiz cards.

features2.subtitle: ViLearning roadmap preview
features2.description: Continuously expand spatial learning capabilities so individuals and teams stay in control of their knowledge network.
features2.feature-4: Automated context summaries and citation lookup

features3.title: Capability overview
features3.subtitle: How each module supports your learning journey
features3.description: Material ingestion, model invocation, display rendering, and collaboration form ViLearning's spatial learning OS.

item-1.title: Material ingestion
item-1.description: Supports text, images, and links, generating semantic vectors and preserving citations.

item-2.title: Context engineering
item-2.description: Configure project prompts, preference parameters, and high-priority content to keep model responses accurate.

item-3.title: Display factory
item-3.description: Render flowcharts, mind maps, quiz cards, and timelines through a unified protocol.

item-4.title: Branches and traceability
item-4.description: Save context snapshots, compare solutions or study paths, and roll back whenever you need.

item-5.title: Collaboration & sharing
item-5.description: Team workspaces, role permissions, and share links keep knowledge captured and synchronized.

item-6.title: Governance and compliance
item-6.description: Audit logs, model call history, and data residency options satisfy enterprise requirements.

pricing.title: Plans
pricing.subtitle: Choose the spatial learning plan that fits your journey
pricing.description: From solo exploration to team collaboration, ViLearning plans cover context quotas, model matrix capabilities, and display bundles.

item-1.question: Does ViLearning offer a free trial?
item-1.answer: Yes. The Explorer plan includes one top-tier model call per day to try context engineering and the display factory. Upgrade to Pathfinder or Team Studio for more usage or collaboration.

item-2.question: How do I inject materials and context into ViLearning?
item-2.answer: Drag in documents, webpages, or images, or paste text - ViLearning cleans it, builds embeddings, and lets you set project-level prompts and whiteboard snapshots so the model stays focused.

item-3.question: Which display formats are supported right now?
item-3.answer: Flowchart and card displays are live; mind maps, quizzes, and timelines are in beta. Every display shares one schema, so you can mount, edit, or export anytime.

item-4.question: How does the top-tier model matrix work?
item-4.answer: ViLearning currently defaults to a top-tier model (DeepSeek during this testing phase). Later you'll switch models in the console to match reasoning, structured, or creative tasks.

item-5.question: What collaboration and branching capabilities are available?
item-5.answer: The Team Studio plan brings team workspaces, role permissions, branch conversations, and context snapshots with full audit history for comparisons and compliance.

item-6.question: How does ViLearning keep data secure?
item-6.answer: We provide data encryption, access control, call logs, and configurable data residency. Team Studio or custom plans unlock more governance for enterprise compliance.

item-7.question: What are the highlights of the upcoming roadmap?
item-7.answer: Soon we'll launch the display SDK, co-editing, and model dashboards. Medium term we'll add auto-summary, knowledge base integrations, and APIs - watch the changelog.

item-8.question: Can ViLearning share content outside the team?
item-8.answer: Yes. Generate restricted links or export JSON and images so partners can view displays without an account.

item-9.question: Can ViLearning integrate with our knowledge base or whiteboard tools?
item-9.answer: We're designing integrations with Notion, Slack, and whiteboard tools so ViLearning output syncs to your workflow via Zapier or custom APIs.

item-1.name: Jonathan Yombo
item-1.quote: Project retros finally feel spatial - branch timelines in ViLearning eliminated version chaos.

item-2.name: Yves Kalume
item-2.quote: Context engineering plus the display factory ended our tool hopping - everything stays on one canvas.

item-3.name: Yucel Faruksahan

item-4.name: Anonymous author
item-4.quote: No more scattered resources - ViLearning labels every reference clearly and keeps the team aligned.

item-5.name: Shekinah Tshiokufila

item-6.name: Oketa Fred
item-6.quote: In ADHD learning mode, losing control is the biggest risk - ViLearning's multi-display design and reminders keep every thread moving.

item-7.name: Zeki
item-7.quote: Model matrix plus branch conversations is incredibly powerful - we can iterate and compare strategies fast.

item-8.name: Joseph Kitheka
item-8.quote: Our OKRs, meeting notes, and experiment results now live in ViLearning, so everyone aligns from the same canvas.

item-9.name: Khatab Wedaa

item-10.name: Rodrigo Aguilar
item-10.quote: Structured display output flows straight into our BI pipeline, saving lots of manual cleanup.

item-11.name: Eric Ampire
item-11.quote: ViLearning gives our team real 'spatial memory' - collaboration feels faster and clearer than ever.

item-12.name: Roland Tubonge
item-12.quote: We migrated in just two weeks - every knowledge asset now stays current in ViLearning.
